document.full_text: the police have discovered what they said was the largest cocaine processing lab ever found in honduras, calling it a troubling sign of mexican drug trafficking organizations spreading into their territory.
document.title: the americas: honduras: cocaine lab said to be sign of mexican gangs
lines_and_colors: the police have discovered what they said was the largest cocaine processing lab ever found in honduras, calling it a troubling sign of mexican drug trafficking organizations spreading into their territory.
